text: Borys Yukhymovych Steklyar (, (29 January 1923 â€“ 18 January 2018) was a Ukrainian colonel of Committee for State Security of USSR. He was one of the main specialists in combating Ukrainian Insurgent Army in Rivne region. He was accused in the murder of two or more people in March 1952, including artist and member of Volyn regional OUN propaganda Referenty Nil Khasevych and two of his colleagues. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Spies Category:Ukrainian military people
title: Borys Yukhymovych Steklyar
